description:
Settle into the budding neighbourhood of Fitzgibbon with this beautiful low-set home, boasting plenty of space for the whole family. Centrally located within the suburb, this home is only a short drive from local shops, schools, and parks so your lifestyle will fit perfectly here!

Through the entry, the North end of the home opens with the spacious living room, with over 20m2 of floor space, this is sure to be a space to entertain the whole family. Venturing down the entry way is the kitchen/dining and family room. With extensive cabinetry, and an abundance of bench space, this intelligently laid out kitchen makes cooking a delight. Across and down the hall, neatly tucked away, is the laundry room, with additional water closet – keeping noisy appliances out of sight.

Flowing on from the kitchen is the generous dining/living. Share a delicious home-cooked meal with the family in a formal setting, or retreat to the lounge where everyone can enjoy that extra comfort. Venture through the glass sliding door through the dining and out to the relaxing, North facing covered patio and modest backyard, the perfect barbecue area. Let the kids and pets run free in the safety of their own backyard, while the parents enjoy some time to relax.

The East side of the home features the three spacious bedrooms, all fitted with built-in robes for convenient storage space with an additional air conditioning unit in the main bedroom. The main bath is fitted with a spacious shower as well as a - and showcase a light, modern design that will have you feeling in the height of luxury.

Kick back in the living room for family movie night, unwind after a long day out on the patio, or simply relax in the comfort of your own bedroom. Create the dream home for you and the family or add to your investment portfolio in the rapidly expanding area of Fitzgibbon. Don't wait – this beautiful home could be yours!

Highlights of the property includes

Three generous bedrooms with built-in wardrobes
Plush carpeted bedrooms for extra comfort
Laundry room adjacent to kitchen keeps noisy appliances out of sight
A spacious bathroom with sizeable shower and bath
Linen closet for convenient storage
Large living room with ample space for the family to kick back and enjoy time together
Family room or formal lounge for optional use
Glass sliding door access from the dining/living that opens up to the covered patio and backyard
Airconditioning in the main dining/living space for relief during the warmer months and comfort throughout winter
Ceiling fans throughout the house for added comfort and air flow
Double car lock up garage with plenty of room for storage
NBN Ready


Facts
Rates – approximately $414 Per Quarter
Utilities – approximately $290 Per Quarter
Current rental appraised at $540 - $580 Per Week

Centrally located and close to:
• 5 min from Taigum Village Shopping Centre (2.1 km)
• 4 min away from Taigum State Primary (2 km)
• 8 min away from Aspley State High School (4.3 km)
• Close to restaurants/cafe's/shops
• Close to public transport; train stations and bus stops within walking distance
• Parks, bicycle and walking tracks near by


This home has been lovingly maintained and is child and pet friendly. There are many lifestyle features not mentioned above which all add to its functionality and liveability. This home is perfect to either raise your family, watch the area grow, reap the rental return, or simply enjoy life in the suburbs. Don't miss this opportunity to secure this home in this superb location.
Contact Sam Tahana on 0400 047 129 or Jordan Baldan-Vine on 0468544264 today
